title: (Google Drive) Shared with me can't access shared files from Team Drives
body:
#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?

When using the --drive-shared-with-me flag or the shared_with_me=true option for a remote, rclone can access files shared publicly from someone's "My Drive", but not a file shared publicly from a Team Drive.

_Files **shared** via Team Drives to the user's "Shared with me" are invisible to rclone, which is the issue._ I'm treating this is a bug because I assume this isn't intentional?

For context on Google Drive website:
Example 1: On the "Shared with me" is a "file.mp4", shared with a public URL. When right-clicking on the file on Google Drive, I can "Add to My Drive" or "Make a copy"

Example 2: On the "Shared with me" is a "video.mp4", shared with a public URL however it is stored in a Team Drive. When right-clicking on the file on Google Drive, I can "Make a copy" but can not "Add to My Drive", only "Star" it.

#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)

rclone v1.48.0-067-g0a1169e6-beta (was using latest stable)

#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (eg Windows 7, 64 bit)

Ubuntu linux/amd64 (on Google Colab Notebook)

####  Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive)

Google Drive

#### The command you were trying to run (eg `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

`rclone --config "/content/drive/My Drive/Files/rclone.conf" copy "gdrive_mydrive:video.mp4" "gdrive_team:/Uploads" --drive-server-side-across-configs -vv`
gdrive_team is specified as a Team Drive
gdrive_mydrive has shared_with_me=true

This command works with "file.mp4" but not "video.mp4"

#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (eg output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

2019/07/15 07:20:21 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.48.0-067-g0a1169e6-beta" starting with parameters ["rclone" "--config" "/content/drive/My Drive/Files/rclone.conf" "copy" "gdrive_mydrive:video.mp4" "gdrive_team:/Uploads" "--drive-server-side-across-configs" "-vv"]
2019/07/15 07:20:21 DEBUG : Using config file from "/content/drive/My Drive/Files/rclone.conf"
2019/07/15 07:20:22 ERROR : : error reading source directory: directory not found
2019/07/15 07:20:22 INFO  : Google drive root 'Uploads': Waiting for checks to finish
2019/07/15 07:20:22 INFO  : Google drive root 'Uploads': Waiting for transfers to finish
2019/07/15 07:20:22 ERROR : Attempt 1/3 failed with 2 errors and: directory not found
2019/07/15 07:20:23 ERROR : : error reading source directory: directory not found
2019/07/15 07:20:23 INFO  : Google drive root 'Uploads': Waiting for checks to finish
2019/07/15 07:20:23 INFO  : Google drive root 'Uploads': Waiting for transfers to finish
2019/07/15 07:20:23 ERROR : Attempt 2/3 failed with 2 errors and: directory not found
2019/07/15 07:20:24 ERROR : : error reading source directory: directory not found
2019/07/15 07:20:24 INFO  : Google drive root 'Uploads': Waiting for checks to finish
2019/07/15 07:20:24 INFO  : Google drive root 'Uploads': Waiting for transfers to finish
2019/07/15 07:20:24 ERROR : Attempt 3/3 failed with 2 errors and: directory not found
2019/07/15 07:20:24 Failed to copy with 2 errors: last error was: directory not found
